search_2020_kamitsure/6601_1201_0100_10:
There you are, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I thought I would find you here!
search_2020_kamitsure/6601_1201_0200_10:
I wanted to show you my gratitude for helping
me out with my show the other day.
search_2020_kamitsure/6601_1201_0300_10:
Come with me. Trust me, you won’t be forgetting
today anytime soon.
search_2020_kamitsure/6602_1201_0100_10:
Mmm! I love the ocean breeze!
And check out this great weather!
search_2020_kamitsure/6602_1201_0200_10:
Come on. Won’t you walk with me? We came all
this way, so let’s enjoy the view together!
search_2020_kamitsure/6603_1201_0100_10:
I’m so glad we were able to come here today!
It’s so much fun having you along!
search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0301_0200_10: Yeah, I think I’ll be heading home.
search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0300_10:
Oh, OK.
Hey, thanks for spending the day with me.
search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0400_10:
I’m always so busy. Days off don’t come along
too often, so today was a fantastic change
of pace.
search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0600_10:
It made me so happy when you said yes to
coming here with me.
search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0401_0700_10: I hope you had as much fun as I did.
search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0302_0800_10:
Why don’t we stay here a
little longer?
search_2020_kamitsure/6604_0402_0900_10: Sure. We can relax a bit longer.
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1101_0100_20:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was invited
to Elesa’s photo shoot. It was bustling with
activity when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] arrived at the meetup spot.
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_0301_0200_10: All right! Let’s shoot some photos!
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_0401_0300_10: There you are! Thanks for coming!
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_0402_0500_10: There you are! Thanks for coming!
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0600_10:
Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I didn’t
know you were invited, too!
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0700_10: Elesa invited us to be in the shoot, too!
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0800_10:
All that’s left is Viola, but where is she?
I wonder if she’s having trouble with her camera.
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_0900_10:
Hmm... Well, we can’t waste too much time
waiting for her. Let’s get this shoot started without
her for now.
search_2020_kamitsure/6605_1201_1000_10:
Come on over here!
Oh no, you’re not getting out of a picture with us!
search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0200_10:
Wha—? Viola?! Were you there this entire time?
What were you doing?
search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0300_10:
Sorry, sorry.
I’ve been watching all of you for a while now!
search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0400_10:
Thanks to that, I got some great candid shots
of you, Elesa!
search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0500_10:
Let me take a picture of the two of you.
It’s the least I can do for these great shots I
got to take!
search_2020_kamitsure/6606_1201_0600_10: Now, line up over there for me!
